xwikidoc.title: Visites Recentes
xwikidoc.content:
#set($recentlyViewed = $xwiki.getRecentActions("view", 5)) #if($recentlyViewed.size() > 0)
Visites Recentes
#set($first = true) #foreach($docname in $recentlyViewed) #set($rdoc = $xwiki.getDocument($docname).getTranslatedDocument()) #if($first == true) #set($first = false) #else | #end $rdoc.displayTitle #end
#end
